_header: Regina celi letare / In whom first this world began
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A macaronic hymn to the Virgin Mary — four 8-line stanzas

CULKk16.First Lines:
Regina celi letareIn whome fyrste þis worlde
                    began…
CULKk16.Last Lines:
…As ȝe to geder were bounden in fereRegina celi
                        letare
CULKk16.Attributed Title:
Here…begynneth Regina celi letare (f. 201v); Here
                    enduth regina celi (f. 202)
CULKk16.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 48-9.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 52-3.
